ValidationRule.description: Activation End Date should be greater than Activation Start Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Activation_End_Date__c) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Activation_End_Date__c)), Activation_End_Date__c <= Activation_Start_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Activation End Date should be greater than Activation Start Date
